text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ese dusenge ibitari Allah, bidafite icyo byatumarira cyangwa byadutwara, maze dusubire mu buhakanyi nyuma y’uko Allah atuyoboye? (Ubwo twaba tubaye) nk’uwayobejwe na Shitani arindagira ku isi, kandi afite inshuti zimuhamagarira kuyoboka (zimubwira ziti) Dusange’". Vuga uti "Mu by’ukuri, umuyoboro wa Allah ni wo muyoboro nyawo, kandi twategetswe kwicisha bugufi kuri Nyagasani w’ibiremwa byose
